name: Into Our Hands - Glass Contributor
metadata:
{"name": "Into Our Hands - Glass Contributor 1", "description": "'Into Our Hands' is an EP, collaborative crowdfund, and community embodied through art, stewarded by music/visual artist yadzi. Read more about this initiative at https://mirror.xyz/yadzi.eth

Glass Contributors will have:
- opportunity to submit a photo for the Intro Track Cover Artwork photo collage
In addition tob�&
- early access to each EP song before itb�s officially released
- sneak preview of my very first music video, currently in post-production
- exclusive access to a never-before-seen live performance video
- token-gated access to private channels on yadzi Discord server

Proceeds from the sale of this NFT will go towards funding future creative endeavors by yadzi + his collaboration partners.

Thank you for your contribution!

Much love <3

yadzi", "image": "ipfs://bafybeiazwzqaplttz2kvdtoq7j7v6kzakcthzxsvpklvr5hbxebetresv4?id=1", "properties": {"number": 1, "name": "Into Our Hands - Glass Contributor"}}
